callToActionDownload.title: Download the Fiksaten mobile app
callToActionDownload.description: With the Fiksaten mobile app, you can easily send a help request. Assistants near you will respond with offers, and you can choose the one that suits you best.

heroSection.title: Find home assistance easily and quickly
heroSection.description: Need help installing a new wardrobe or perhaps mounting a TV on the wall? With Fiksaten, you can find a reliable worker easily, even on the same day.

secondaryHero.title: Easily compare offers for any job
secondaryHero.description: You can easily and quickly compare even small jobs. Just send a help request and choose a suitable offer from the services. Home-based work is eligible for tax deductions.

findNearYouSection.title: Find a worker near you
findNearYouSection.description: You can easily and quickly compare even small jobs. Just send a help request and choose a suitable offer from the assistant. Home-based work is eligible for tax deductions.

yourSupportSection.title: Fiksaten is here to support you
yourSupportSection.description: Our customer service is here to assist with any questions. You can contact our customer service via email or conveniently through the chat.
yourSupportSection.additionalDescription: Customer service is available on weekdays from 9-18.
yourSupportSection.imageTitle: Want to join as an assistant?
yourSupportSection.imageDescription: Fiksaten offers a convenient and easy way to find clients near you. You get all the necessary software tools and the freedom to set your own working hours. You'll also have access to reports on completed work and payments.

recomendedSection.title: “With Fiksaten, I got my new TV mounted on the wall just a few hours after submitting the request. I will definitely use it again.”

faq2.question: How does sending a request work?

faq4.question: The job was canceled, what should I do?

faq5.question: The assistant didn't show up, what do I do?
faq5.answer: If the assistant didn't arrive at the agreed time and the request was still open, please contact Fiksaten's customer service. Our team will help resolve the issue and, if necessary, assist in finding another assistant for your job.

faq6.question: What payment methods do you accept?

faq7.question: How can I join as an assistant?

verification.enter: Enter the verification code sent to your phone:
verification.verificationSuccessDescription: Your phone number has been successfully verified.
verification.verificationFailedDescription: Please check the code and try again.

password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.min: Password must be at least {{min}} characters long

promotionHeader: The Fiksaten mobile app is out! Download now and easily submit your help request.
